FuncDef:
The multicast p2mp load-balance number command sets the number of trunk member interfaces that balance multicast traffic on a P2MP tunnel node.
The undo multicast p2mp load-balance number command restores the default number of trunk member interfaces that balance multicast traffic on a P2MP tunnel node.
By default, 16 trunk member interfaces balance traffic on a P2MP tunnel node.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of trunk member interfaces that balance multicast traffic on a P2MP tunnel.
The value is an integer that ranges from 2 to 64.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Trunk member interfaces on a P2MP tunnel node can use the hash algorithm to balance multicast traffic. To set the number of trunk member interfaces that balance multicast traffic on a P2MP tunnel, run the multicast p2mp load-balance number command.
After the multicast p2mp load-balance number command is run, it takes effect only after a new P2MP tunnel is established.
